stealthyStalker.name: Stealthy Stalker
stealthyStalker.desc: Expert hunter who utilize own natural camouflage and feline agility to track prey silently.

vibrato.name: Vibrato
vibrato.desc: Creative souls who harness the vibrations of the underground world to create mesmerizing art.

ironcladCrusader.name: Ironclad Crusader
ironcladCrusader.desc: Formidable warrior clad in impenetrable steel armor forged from the abundant resources of Poeir's foundries.

padoPoe.name: Pado Poe
padoPoe.desc: 221th child of the king of the Poeir, who started the second great war against the Therme empire.

blink.name: Blink
blink.desc: Resourceful hunters who stalk prey in the darkness of the underground.

cosmos.name: Cosmos
cosmos.desc: The revered shaman of the Nature tribe defending their kin with cosmic fury and celestial might.

royalBellyRubber.name: Royal Belly Rubber
royalBellyRubber.desc: Skilled masseurs trained in the art of giving luxurious belly rubs to the empire's noble cats.

magmaWarden.name: Magma Warden
magmaWarden.desc: Protectors of Therme, using abilities to create defensive barriers and shield their fellow felines from harm.

dreamweaver.name: Dreamweaver
dreamweaver.desc: Visionary artists who draw inspiration from the twinkling night sky

lionheartClawson.name: Lionheart Clawson
lionheartClawson.desc: A noble and courageous knight of the empire of Poeir.

greatClaw.name: Greatclaw
greatClaw.desc: Protector of sacred groves and ancient landmarks, sworn to defend the balance of nature.

moltenShadow.name: Molten Shadow
moltenShadow.desc: Hunter who thrives in the fiery depths of volcanic regions. "Ashes to ashes, dust to dust."
